a.span: Wadsworth City School District Quality Profile

div.span:
Bear Cub Academy is now registering students. Please send your completed registration form (found on the district forms page) and fee to:
Ms. Kelly Stallman Bear Cub Academy 524 Broad Street Wadsworth, OH 44281
Join us for the WCS Grizzly Spirit Challenge! To learn more, please click on the news story headline.

a.title: Click to read more about: WCS Grizzly Spirit Challenge

div.span: Please click here for important information from our Superintendent Dr. Hill regarding the coronavirus situation. - Last updated Sunday, April 20, 2020, at 3:33 pm

a.title: Click to read more about: Coronavirus Situation Update

p.span: The mission of the Wadsworth City Schools, in cooperation with families, school personnel, and community, is to provide an education in a safe environment that will enable all students to reach their highest potential.
